extension.description:
Port of FCEUmm / FCEUX to Libretro. FCEUX is a NES, Famicom, and Famicom Disk System (FDS) emulator. The concept behind FCEUX is to merge elements from FCEU Ultra, FCEU rerecording, FCEUXD, FCEUXDSP, FCEUXDSP CE, and FCEU-mm into a single branch of FCEU.
Supported files: .nes, .fds, .unif, .zip
Source: https://github.com/libretro/fceu-next
